verses.name: 1 Kings 15:8
verses.text: And Abijam slept with his fathers; and they buried him in the city of David: and Asa his son reigned in his stead.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:9
verses.text: And in the twentieth year of Jeroboam king of Israel reigned Asa over Judah.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:10
verses.text: And forty and one years reigned he in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name was Maachah, the daughter of Abishalom.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:11
verses.text: And Asa did that which was right in the eyes of the Lord, as did David his father.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:12
verses.text: And he took away the sodomites out of the land, and removed all the idols that his fathers had made.
